resources.string: Welcome to Based Share. The place where Gamers, Kinophiles and Musicophiles all come together to share based ideas on their respective entertainment categories.
Click the button below to join the community
Share the latest trends in gaming. Be it new Doom Eternal or Elden Ring Strategies to the latest optimistic PCMR builds and console hacks
From Yojimbo to the Batman, From Clint Eastwood to Ryan Gosling. Share and rant about your Kino preference and also review tv shows on the go

Be it a cinematic score by Ennio Morricone, a video Game Soundtrack by Mick Gordon or a track from a band whose name you keep forgetting, we have no limits. Share music to promote lesser known artists and get new preferences
